title: Emerging IAM Trends
description: Explore the future of identity and access management with Decentralized Identity (DID), Verifiable Credentials, Continuous Access Evaluation (CAE), Zero Trust architecture, and emerging standards.
learningObjectives: Understand Decentralized Identity (DID) and how it shifts control from centralized providers to users
Master Verifiable Credentials (VCs) and their three-party model (Issuer, Holder, Verifier)
Implement Continuous Access Evaluation (CAE) for real-time token revocation and security
Design and implement adaptive authentication and risk-based access control systems
Architect Zero Trust security models with policy decision points and micro-segmentation
Prepare for future IAM trends including passwordless, AI-powered security, and quantum-resistant cryptography

badge.name: Future-Ready IAM Expert
badge.description: Mastered emerging trends in identity and access management including DID, Verifiable Credentials, CAE, and Zero Trust
